T02TD1893E:231b-1: a'ary'a wa lo ka te shva ra s'a dha nam /
T02TD1893E:231b-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD1893E:231b-4: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1893E:231b-5: gang thugs thugs rje'i dbang gyur te //
T02TD1893E:231b-6: rtag tu gzhan gyi don mdzad pa //
T02TD1893E:231b-8: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02TD1893E:231b-9: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed cing //
T02TD1893E:231b-10: dad dang snying rjer ldan pa dang //
T02TD1893E:231b-11: bla ma la gus gtong sems ldan //
T02TD1893E:231b-12: bden par smra zhing brtson ldan pas //
T02TD1893E:232a-0: yid dang rjes su mthun gnas @232a * //
T02TD1893E:232a-2: / bde ba'i sta na la 'dug nas kyang //
T02TD1893E:232a-3: sngon du bya ba rnams byas la //
T02TD1893E:232a-4: 'jig rten mgon po bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1893E:232a-5: dang po bdag nyid kyi snying gar aa las ri bong can bsams la /
T02TD1893E:232a-6: de'i steng du sa bon gyi yi ge bsams te /
T02TD1893E:232a-7: de las 'od 'phros pas 'jig rten mgon po spyan drangs te /
T02TD1893E:232a-8: phyag la sogs pa yan lag bdun pa bya'o //
T02TD1893E:232a-9: de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa byas la snying rje chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1893E:232a-10: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1893E:232a-12: des dngos po thams cad gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis su med pa stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1893E:232a-13: de nas rang gi sems nyid bam las padma 'dab ma brgyad par bsams te /
T02TD1893E:232a-14: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1893E:232a-15: de'i dbus su yang sa bon gyi yi ge de nyid do //
T02TD1893E:232a-16: de las 'od 'phros 'gro ba rnams dag par byas nas de nyid du bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1893E:232a-17: de yongs su gyur ba las bdag nyid 'jig rten mgon po sku mdog dmar po /
T02TD1893E:232a-22: phyag drug pa g-yas g-yon dang po gnyis snyom par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya can /
T02TD1893E:232a-24: gsum pa na padma dang ral gri bsnams pa /
T02TD1893E:232a-26: gsum pa na rin po che dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1893E:232a-27: de'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' rang dang 'dra ba'i cha phra ba'o //
T02TD1893E:232a-28: de'i thugs kar ri bong can la sa bon gyi yi ge'o //
T02TD1893E:232a-30: ye shes pa rang bzhin gyi gnas nas spyan drangs la mchod pa byas la /
T02TD1893E:232a-37: de nas gnas gsum du yi ge gsum bsams la /
T02TD1893E:232a-38: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1893E:232a-40: sangs rgyas lnga spyan drangs la mchod pa byas la /
T02TD1893E:232a-41: mgon po de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis //
T02TD1893E:232b-0: bdag la dbang bskur mdzad @232b du gsol //
T02TD1893E:232b-1: zhes gsol ba gang ba cing /
T02TD1893E:232b-2: des dbang bskur bar bsam zhing rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas gdab po /
T02TD1893E:232b-3: de nyid rnam par gsal bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1893E:232b-4: yang 'byung ba rlung las grub pa'i padma tsa na ka'i tshad tsam steng gi sna'i rtse mor reg pa'i mtshan ma dang /
T02TD1893E:232b-5: gzugs kyi mtshan ma byung ba'i bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1893E:232b-6: yang sa bon gyi yi ge de las de'i sku rnams spro zhing bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1893E:232b-7: de nas spro bar gyur na ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon la /
T02TD1893E:232b-8: aom a'a:aom ma ni padme h'um h'um hr'i: sv'a h'a /
T02TD1893E:232b-9: zhes bya ba g-yon skor du bkod de /
T02TD1893E:232b-10: man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1893E:232b-11: de nas ldang bar 'dod na ye shes sems dpa' phyung la mchod pa byas te /
T02TD1893E:232b-12: gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas //
T02TD1893E:232b-13: 'dir ni bya min gang byas pa //
T02TD1893E:232b-14: gang yang lus can skyabs gyur pa //
T02TD1893E:232b-15: mgon po khyod ni bzod par mdzod //
T02TD1893E:232b-16: ces gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1893E:232b-17: rtag tu gzhan gyi don mdzad pa //
T02TD1893E:232b-18: 'jig rten dbang phyug grub pa ni //
T02TD1893E:232b-19: dge ba de yis thob gyur cig //
T02TD1893E:232b-20: 'gro bas kyang ni de thob shog / ces bya bas smon lam gdab par bya'o //
T02TD1893E:232b-23: zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1893E:232b-24: 'byung ba thams cad la yang bya //
T02TD1893E:232b-25: mdun du chos 'byung pad zla can //
T02TD1893E:232b-26: bsams la sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1893E:232b-27: 'byung po thams cad bkug nas ni //
T02TD1893E:232b-28: rang 'dod lha yi rnam par bya //
T02TD1893E:232b-29: gtor ma sbyang ba'i rim pa ni //
T02TD1893E:232b-30: yam byung rlung las ram byung me //
T02TD1893E:232b-31: aa las byung ba'i pad snod du //
T02TD1893E:232b-32: mu bi ra shu ma las byung ba yi //
T02TD1893E:232b-33: rdo rje chu sogs rdzas rnams bsang //
T02TD1893E:232b-34: sbyang ba la sogs rnam byas nas //
T02TD1893E:232b-35: de ru yi ge hr'i:bkod de //
T02TD1893E:232b-36: ye shes bdud rtsi bkug byas la //
T02TD1893E:232b-37: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rjes dkrugs //
T02TD1893E:232b-39: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dharmm'a n'am a'a dya nutpanna tv'a ta aom a'a:h'um phat /
T02TD1893E:232b-40: ces lam bdun nam gsum bzlas ya dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1893E:232b-41: de nas de rnams tshim pas gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin thob par bsams la /
T02TD1893E:233a-2: zas la nye bar spyod dus su snga ma'i ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis kha zas snga ma bzhin sbyangs la /
T02TD1893E:233a-3: snying gar rang gi ha bsams la //
T02TD1893E:233a-4: nang gi sbyin sreg bsam ldan pas //
T02TD1893E:233a-5: zas la nye bar spyad par bya //
T02TD1893E:233a-6: de nas mchod rten la sogs kyi //
T02TD1893E:233a-7: dge ba'i las la 'bad par bya //
T02TD1893E:233a-8: nyal ba'i dus su bdag nyid kyi //
T02TD1893E:233a-9: snying ga'i sa bon de nyid du //
T02TD1893E:233a-10: brtan dang g-yo ba kun bsdus te //
T02TD1893E:233a-11: bdag nyid kyang ni der bsdus la //
T02TD1893E:233a-12: stong nyid ting 'dzin la gnas bya //
T02TD1893E:233a-13: nang par langs nas snga ma bzhin //
T02TD1893E:233a-14: sgrub ba la ni 'jug par bya //
T02TD1893E:233a-15: khrus ni rang la dbang bskur bsam //
T02TD1893E:233a-17: 'jig rten dbang po sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD1893E:233a-18: mar me mdzad dpal ye shes kyis //
T02TD1893E:233a-19: man ngag mdor bsdus 'dir bshad yin //
T02TD1893E:233a-20: 'jig rten mgon po sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
